lastSession.summary: Fixed commit command git diff errors on new files, fixed toast notifications suppressed by terminal focus check, added --clarity to README

shipped.summary: Add diff safety guidance to commit command to prevent errors on new files
Remove terminal focus check that suppressed toast notifications since Feb 6 refactor
Eliminate sub-agents and add verify-before-run guards across fix/push/analyze/reflect/think commands
Merge divergent local and remote branches, resolve push.md conflict
Optimize /push: use direct Bash calls instead of sub-agents, auto-fix before verify
Consolidate duplicated sound/notification code, remove legacy notify_completion.py
Unify Stop hooks into single process with ctypes
Use sys.platform instead of platform.system() to avoid WMI deadlock on Python 3.13+
Improve handoff protocol with concrete steps and clearer command descriptions
Ensure .claude/ tracked in git (remove from gitignore), only ignore backups
